players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie knew my investigation, be cautious. Any alibis?"
Charlie: "I knew it, stay vigilant. No alibis tonight."
You: "I noticed Bob and Charlie had similar alibis last night. Any thoughts?"
Bob: "Charlie's alibi match suggests he may have known my investigation. Stay alert."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie's alibi match was suspicious."
You: "Noticing Bob and Charlie's alibis, I'll watch both closely. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie knew my investigation, be cautious. Any alibis?"
Charlie: "I knew it, stay vigilant. No alibis tonight."
Alice: "I noticed Bob and Charlie had similar alibis last night. Any thoughts?"
You: "Charlie's alibi match suggests he may have known my investigation. Stay alert."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie's alibi match was suspicious."
Alice: "Noticing Bob and Charlie's alibis, I'll watch both closely. Stay cautious."
